title.rendered: Automation Hour W/ Guest Presenter Meighan Brodkey Auto-Add Users to Chatter Groups

content.rendered:
Automation Hour W/ Guest Presenter Meighan Brodkey
December 16, 2016See how you can auto-add users to Chatter Groups when edited or created using clicks not code.  Using a List Custom Setting, a Flow, and a Process, you can automation the creation of Chatter Group members for your internal and external Users as an admin, without a developer.


Video



Watch Video


Slideshare Deck

FFFF

View Deck



Dev Org Install

Install the demo seen in the video in your dev org from the AppExchange with this link.

Install App



Sandbox Install

Install the demo seen in the video in your sandbox org from the AppExchange with this link.

Install App

@graph.name: Meighan Brodkey
@graph.description: Salesforce MVP, Slack pusher, learning fanatic, detail obsessed, WIT User Group leader, Technical Architect, ❤️ challenges. Former Girl Scout, current rockstar.

jetpack-related-posts.title: Automation Hour w/ Meighan Brodkey 3: Flow Components
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: The Presentation I was honored be a guest presenter on Automation Hour for the 3rd time in 2018. Within the last year salesforce released the ability to use Lightning Components within Visual Workflow.  This allows for massive amounts of increased functionality, as well as the ability to do smaller amounts of…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Automation Hour w/ Meighan Brodkey Community Non-Account Based Sharing
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Meighan Brodkey presents a great session on Rollup Summary Fields with Lookups. Meighan takes the standard "Rollup" mentality to the next level with dynamic rollups based on what type of record is connected to the record. An awesome scenario that can show you how to take your automation to the…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Automation Hour:  Community Users with Flow and Platform Events
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Automation Hour 2019 Forgot UsernameSeptember 2019 Use Case Looking for a declarative way to do a forgot username on communities. No out of the box componentSecurity prevents guests from User Lookup The Presenters Meighan Brodkey Meighan is a technical architect and the leader of the Seattle Women in Tech User Group…

jetpack-related-posts.title: Automation Hour 2021: Einstein Bot Flows &  Omni-Channel Routing
jetpack-related-posts.excerpt: Curious about Einstein Bots, Flow, or the new Omni-Channel Routing functionality? In this episode of Automation Hour, you'll learn about AI and all of that inside of Salesforce from Technical Architect & Salesforce MVP, Meighan Brodkey.

img.alt_text: Automation Hour: Flows, Bots, and AI… OH MY!!!
